title: 2 more men arrested in connection with fatal Ocala shooting
content:
OCALA, Fla. - Authorities have arrested two more suspects in connection with a fatal shooting at an Ocala nightclub that left a woman dead and five others injured.
The Marion County Sheriff's Office arrested Gary King, 20, and Michael Smith, 20, on Monday. Both are being charged with second-degree homicide and five counts of attempted second-degree homicide.
The two suspects and another man, Laquan Ria'Mel Barrow, 24, are all accused of opening fire into a crowd at the Cloud 9 nightclub in Ocala on Sept. 13.
The shots killed Benetria Robinson, 19, and injured the others.
Police recorded 21 shots being fired.
